title: 07/30/2021 - HOUR 1 - Russell Westbrook, NBA Draft, Kurt Helin
itunes:title: 07/30/2021 - HOUR 1 - Russell Westbrook, NBA Draft, Kurt Helin
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Doug Gottlieb--in for Colin--sees a few issues with former Washington Wizard Russell Westbrook joining the Los Angeles Lakers after a blockbuster trade Thursday night. Plus, Doug dissects the differences between home-grown professional basketball prospects and international talents--and how they'll impact the NBA. Also, we finally hear from maligned Green Bay general manager Brian Gutekunst and Doug reacts. Lastly, Kurt Helin--lead writer and managing editor of ProBasketballTalk--joins The Herd to discuss the NBA Draft and other hoops topics. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
